video.title: La Viuda Negra
video.synopsis: Beautiful and ruthless Griselda Blanco, known as the queen of cocaine, becomes Pablo Escobar's boss and governs a world of deceit and death.

episodes.synopsis: "Black Widow" Griselda pleads in court that her death sentence be postponed; an alleged priest gives Griselda a drug to fake her death and escape.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: When Griselda's mother becomes a prostitute, a client rapes her young daughter. In the aftermath, Griselda turns to crime and falls for a gangster.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Dario exacts revenge on the man who raped Griselda; Griselda hides a young man she kidnapped in her mother's house.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Griselda shoots the kidnapper. Mr. Restrepo sends his men to kill all the members of the gang, but Dario and Griselda manage to escape.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: When Griselda and Dario meet the owner of a bar, the guy underestimates her, but not for long; Griselda's mother hovers between life and death.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Griselda catches Dario with another woman and punishes him for his betrayal; Griselda steals money from her boss and plans to go to the United States.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Griselda reaches Ecuador and buys $150,000 of cocaine from a dealer who falls for her, but her first objective is to avenge her mother's death.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Police interrupt Griselda's visit to her mother's grave; Griselda hires men to kidnap Restrepo; Griselda gets an idea for transporting cocaine.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Griselda kills Restrepo and the men who tortured her mother; Griselda kidnaps a shoemaker; Antonio travels to Medellin looking for Griselda.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: The cobbler shows Griselda a pair of shoes with cocaine inside the heel; Guaguanco steals the corpse of Griselda's mother and holds it for ransom.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Griselda and the girls fly to the U.S. with the shoes containing cocaine; Guaguanco arrives at the funeral home, but conceals himself among the dead.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Griselda, Antonio, Richie and Killer travel to New York; Sugar gives Griselda all her money; Griselda meets her rival in the cocaine trade.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Griselda trades travel to the people of Antioquia for the use of their bags to transport drugs; a gunfight with Enzo leaves Griselda at death's door.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Griselda gives birth to a son; Giacomo commits a murder to incriminate Griselda; Griselda hires women to sell cocaine in nightclubs.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Enzo places a bomb near the Empire State Building; Guaguanco looks into why Juliana's agency has been sending Antioquia's people to New York for free.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Griselda's son is sick, but she must leave him in the hospital alone to avoid capture; Sugar and Richie receive a huge shipment of cocaine.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Sugar's plan to get Griselda's son out of the hospital and give him to Celia goes awry; Enzo prepares a dinner for Griselda.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Antonio tries to reactivate the cocaine business to find Griselda and learns of her betrayal; Enzo asks Griselda to marry him and gives her a ring.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Griselda is about to marry Enzo, but suddenly grabs a gun and tries to escape with her son; Antonio informs Griselda that he is her new competition.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Antonio snitches on Griselda, but she manages to evade the police. In Miami, Griselda and Richie find a house and a woman who will launder the money.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Antonio buys a home in Antioch and plans to get revenge on Griselda by taking her son; Griselda asks Susana to furnish her home.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Richie reveals his affections to Griselda; when Griselda gets into the Jacuzzi with Susana, Richie sees them and takes aim.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: On the news, the coroner states that Griselda and her men were killed. Griselda lives quietly with Sugar and Richie -- but only for a while.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Griselda wants to transport cocaine in a submarine; Guaguancó tells Antonio that Griselda is alive and offers to be his U.S. distributor.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Griselda's men deliver goods on a submarine; Sugar learns that Antonio and Guaguancó are selling drugs in Miami, so Griselda and Richie hunt for them.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: After a murder occurs in Griselda's basement, she surrenders to Agent Jones so that others may escape and is sentenced to life in prison.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: In prison, a fight is organized between Griselda another female inmate; Griselda's lawyer receives a threat; Tyler visits Griselda behind bars.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Griselda thinks that Tyler is a drug agent who wants information; the guard warns Griselda that there will be another fight -- this time to the death.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Griselda arrives at the fight drugged and in a wheelchair; Sugar and Richie ask Griselda's lawyer to deliver a letter he does not want her to receive.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: In an intimate moment, Griselda begs her lawyer not to fail her; guards who try to rape Griselda get a lethal surprise; Tyler visits Griselda in jail.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Griselda asks Tyler to murder her lawyer; Jones tells Griselda that she has to reveal where Sugar and Richie are in order to save her son.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Tyler visits Griselda, and they have sex. Richie tells Celia to photograph the son of John F. Kennedy, because he will be kidnapped.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Silvio and Michael visit Griselda in jail; Michael asks Griselda how Antonio died; a vagabond is about to kill Michael, but Caty steps in.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Sugar learns that Tyler is the police informant; Norm Jones sends Griselda a letter to warn her about Tyler.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Tyler calls the police to warn them that the Kennedys are targets; guards burn Griselda's cell; Loraine is critically injured.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Richie kidnaps Sugar from the hospital, but he doesn't remember anything; Richie learns of Tyler's betrayal and that he and Sugar are being followed.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Sugar regains his memory and shares vital information; Jones tells Griselda that he loves her and that he will kill her and commit suicide afterward.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Richie sends Griselda a message; Celia and Cary kill Marta and send her uncle the ashes; Marta's uncle plots revenge on Griselda.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro kidnaps Juliana and tortures her to locate Michael; while playing football in the park with Silvio, Griselda's son is kidnapped.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro sends photos of Michael to Griselda, and she is glad that he is alive; Silvio tells Caty that he will kidnap Kennedy alone.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: A tourist sabotages the kidnapping of Kennedy; Garcia recognizes Sugar in the attack; the police chase Richie in an effort to arrest him.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Griselda is tried in court, found guilty of all her crimes and sentenced to the electric chair; Otalvaro sends a horrifying message to Griselda.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Griselda eats the poisoned letter, and the priest takes her confession before accompanying her to the execution, but events do not unfold as planned.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Griselda escapes from prison in an ambulance; Tyler pays for his betrayal; Garcia tries to stop Griselda in a deadly shootout.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Norm Jones tells Garcia that he will accompany him to Medellin; Griselda meets Otalvaro at a restaurant, where he sets his terms.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro takes Michael and Griselda with him; Karla has a narrow escape; Otalvaro calls upon Pablo Escobar to help him work against Griselda.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Griselda learns that Otalvaro is alive and that he plans to kill her; Susana ties Griselda to her bed, but Griselda will not take it lying down.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Jones and Garcia confront the Colombian police; Susana asks Otalvaro to join her in destroying Griselda; Karla and Michael receive death threats.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: Escobar murders policemen and blames Griselda; Susana tells Otalvaro about the cocaine Griselda transported by submarine; Escobar travels in disguise.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: Griselda discovers that Jones is chasing her again. Sugar wants to kill Jones, but Griselda has other plans; Otalvaro's men murder and maim.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Jones intervenes when Susana, Otalvaro and a band of thugs descend upon Griselda's house; Otalvaro asks Escobar to help him recover his daughter.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: Silvio scouts for a location for Griselda's business and visits a salon that is for sale; Susana agrees to be Otalvaro's woman.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro proposes marriage to Susana; Sugar and Jones have a deadly encounter at the cemetery; Sugar and Richie begin work at the salon.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro tells Susana his plans to betray Escobar; Griselda orders Richie to spend the night with her -- a command she later regrets.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Silvio and Richie attack Col. Bolivar and make it to work without a scratch; Karla tends to an inquisitive agent Garcia at the hair salon.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro asks the police to give him Jones; Garcia gives a letter to Jones that contains a special plea; Griselda reveals her feelings to Richie.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Jones is taken to Otalvaro and locked in a refrigerator; when Karla faints, Griselda administers a pregnancy test, which bears complicated results.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Silvio proposes his get-rich scheme of stealing merchandise from Griselda; Griselda must improvise when the police pay a visit to the hair salon.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Garcia confronts two policemen at a bar after overhearing them talk about Jones's kidnapping; Jones battles Otalvaro for his freedom.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Escobar rides a helicopter to a meeting, but then realizes that Otalvaro betrayed him; Jones's son tells Garcia he wants to help look for his father.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro learns that Jones's son is in Medellin; Karla faints, and Griselda sends Michael and Richie to get help; Silvio witnesses a shocking murder.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro and Susana marry; Escobar arranges for several car bombs; Otalvaro learns that his mother died and pressures Jones to help him catch Escobar.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: The police bring in Silvio for questioning; Garcia plots to take Griselda's cocaine-laden submarine; Griselda plans to burn down the jail.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: When Richie and Sugar set the prison ablaze, Karla struggles to escape; Richie and Sugar face Silvio and his hostage; Michael and Richie plot revenge.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Susana tells Otalvaro that she thinks Griselda ordered Karla's death; when Otalvaro kidnaps Jones's son, Jones turns to Garcia for help.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Otalvaro orders Poncho to fetch the bodies of his mother and Karla; Garcia sends a message to Griselda; Escobar makes a deal with the police.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Susana uses violent means to enter a room containing Otalvaro's cocaine; Griselda plans to exchange flour for the cocaine confiscated by the police.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Griselda calls Garcia with a tip that should work to her advantage; Susana, Silvio and Mala Hierba take all of Otalvaro's merchandise to a cellar.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Griselda, Richie and Sugar set a bomb inside the Drug Enforcement Agency; Garcia chases the ambulance in which Griselda, Sugar and Richie flee.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Sugar asks Richie to play music as he dies; Garcia tells Jones that they need to kill Griselda, but they are on opposite poles.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: A drunk tells the police where they can find Griselda and her men; Griselda and Richie leave a grenade in Sugar's hands as police arrive on the scene.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: Michael faces Silvio and threatens to kill him slowly; Richie proposes marriage to Griselda; Michael tells Susana that he will call the police.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Richie warns Griselda that Jones is in Medellin; Silvio breaks free and shoots Michael, who is found by the police and rushed off in an ambulance.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Robert is hospitalized after a suicide attempt; Garcia uses Michael as bait to find Griselda, hiding him in a cellar without proper medical care.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Garcia posts photos of Michael on the street to lure Griselda into his trap; townspeople discover that Susana is in a house for protected witnesses.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Grasa plans to betray Griselda; Garcia tries to convince Griselda to trade her freedom for Michael's life.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Garcia tells Griselda where he will release Michael; Ximena fires at police to aid Richie and Griselda's escape; Griselda and Richie meet Robert.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Jones takes Michael's place to block Garcia's trap; Griselda and Richie say goodbye with a kiss; Michael follows his mother's ways and seeks revenge.
episodes.title: La Viuda Negra Capítulo 78
